TopicTitle: [WIP - 0.25] Squad HD Re-texture Project - Continuous Release (July 25)

Articles.Content: What unity version are you using? Cause last time I tried I was having problems

What unity version are you using? Cause last time I tried I was having problems

I dont' use Unity at all ATM. Despite to be unemployed, I don't have time to learn and do much more things than now (believe me, I do A LOT of things, I'm a very renacentist person in that sense, lol).

Nazari1382 gave me permission to use my textures and tweaks in his .MU and config files, so for the moment that is what I'm using. Perhaps in the near future I should dust off the zbrush, and learn something of Unity to do my own parts, but sadly for now my economic survival is more important, lol...
Heh, well, Unity is pretty easy to learn for the basics. I want to create me custom mus. I will figureit out some time. And I use PS.

I find it ironic how the "HD Textures" text in the OP is fuzzy

Also, if I may ask, could you please put the trefoil back on the NERVA? Removing that removes the feeling of "woah woah nuke stuff danger!11!!one". If you understand what I mean.

I find it ironic how the "HD Textures" text in the OP is fuzzy

Also, if I may ask, could you please put the trefoil back on the NERVA? Removing that removes the feeling of "woah woah nuke stuff danger!11!!one". If you understand what I mean.

I actually intended it to be ironic.

Wasn't it back? I think I changed it.
Yes, it's back on there. Should update OP, blackheart
So that's why. LOL. My bad, My bad.

I actually intended it to be ironic.

Wasn't it back? I think I changed it.

Bad boy, screwing with my OCD >

But seriously, I'm loving this

Bad boy, screwing with my OCD >

But seriously, I'm loving this

Then that's cool that you love it!
I miss your mk1, and I've never had it.... Is that possible?

Last time I saw it, it still had the Kerbal States in it. I deleted my PSD with my command folder since the freakin test copy of my game always has stuff deleted. (I recently deleted my 2 SRB textures accidentally, too. A little bit frustrated about that.

Last time I saw it, it still had the Kerbal States in it. I deleted my PSD with my command folder since the freakin test copy of my game always has stuff deleted. (I recently deleted my 2 SRB textures accidentally, too. A little bit frustrated about that.

Just goes to show - you should always ALWAYS let us have it when you're done...
lol. Maybe you're right. But most of my "done" textures are changed everytime I see them XDDD
I want this retexture......
You can download it Right there.
These retextures are really nice. I personally don't really like the default textures for the rockets, and this made them quite a lot nicer.
I love that LV-N

Really nice work!

but I do miss the little Orange canister thingy from the LV-N. (my favorite place to connect up fuel lines)

I love your re-texture! While I like some of the stock textures, I am personally not a fan of all the black and yellow that they have. It makes me feel like my rocket should be blasting off from a construction site Have you considered doing any re-textures of the stock decouplers?

Absolutely great work, huge improvement over stock textures! The only thing I'd recommend changing is red captions on the engines: the serif font is very out of place and deep red on dark gray is not a good looking combination in general. I realize KW originals had something like this too, but I think it was one thing not worth reproducing from the otherwise brilliant quality KW texture work.
Hey! Bac is back!

Absolutely great work, huge improvement over stock textures! The only thing I'd recommend changing is red captions on the engines: the serif font is very out of place and deep red on dark gray is not a good looking combination in general. I realize KW originals had something like this too, but I think it was one thing not worth reproducing from the otherwise brilliant quality KW texture work.

Beautiful, thanks for that feedback, bac9, its worth a lot coming from you because I use B9 a lot
Thanks man, I appreciate those words

Blackheart...any chance you've released this one yet?

I thought my pack was out of date but the one in the post only has the engine textures.
Just on that note, don't take this the wrong way Blackheart but that pod is nowhere near the quality of the engines.
